oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Framed letter from Rep. William S. Rosecrans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter is written by congressman Rosecrans to his West Point classmate and former Union general Horatio G. Wright, now chief of the Army Corps of Engineers, concerning a Corps project on the Cape Fear River in North Carolina. Former Union general; and Army of the Cumberland commander Rosecrans served two terms in Congress, was elected from California in 1881, and served as minister to Mexico under President Andrew Johnson.
